description.full: Pro Evolution Soccer 2008 is the most challenging soccer game yet! An all-new revolutionary AI system - “TeamVision” - has its eye on you, reacting to your every move and continually adjusting to your style of play. Think you’ve got a flawless gameplan? Think again!
description.short: Pro Evolution Soccer 2008 is the most challenging soccer game yet! An all-new revolutionary AI system - “TeamVision” - has its eye on you, reacting to your every move and continually adjusting to your style of play. Think you’ve got a flawless gameplan? Think again!
